knowledge.question: Recently, some changes occurred in the environment where the product will be used. How does this impact the Product Backlog?
choices: The Product Backlog remains the same.
The Product Backlog will be updated with those changes
The Product Backlog should be kept high-level enough to tolerate such changes
A new Product Backlog baseline is created after saving the old one
explanation: The Product Backlog is a dynamic concept that is always changing to reflect feedback from various entities.
